articles.title: Chinese Vice-President Meets DPRK Youth Friendship Delegation
articles.content:
Chinese Vice-President Meets DPRK Youth Friendship Delegation
Beijing, October 19 (KCNA-Correspondent) -- Li Yuanchao, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and vice-president of China, met and had a talk with the DPRK youth friendship delegation headed by Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing on Friday.
					Li said that the Korean people are making great achievements in the drive to develop economy and improve the standard of people's living under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					He hoped the young people of the two countries would boost the traditional relations of friendship provided by the revolutionaries of the elder generations.

articles.title: Participants in KPA Meeting Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Participants in KPA Meeting Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 4th meeting of company commanders and political instructors of the Korean People's Army visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Saturday to pay tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					They paid tribute to the statues of the great Generalissimos who founded and developed the Korean revolutionary forces.
					
					They entered the halls where the great Generalissimos lie in state and paid homage to them in deep reverence.
					
					They went round with keen interest the halls where orders the great Generalissimos received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Joint Performances Given by Artistes of DPRK, Russia
articles.content:
Joint Performances Given by Artistes of DPRK, Russia
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Joint performances were given by the artistes of the National Symphony Orchestra of the DPRK and the Orchestra of the 21st Century of Russia at the Mansudae Art Theatre on Friday and Saturday.
					Famous conductors, players and vocalists of the two countries put on the stage choruses immortal revolutionary hymns "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il", chorus and orchestral music "Kalinka" and other numbers.
					
					Through chorus and orchestral music "Ode to the Motherland", orchestral music "Carmen Overture", female solo "Flying over Sky above Russia" and unaccompanied chorus and male solo "On Vast Plain" mesmerized the audience as the performers represented high artistic ability and rendition skills.
					
					Vocalists of the two countries sang female duet "Ardent Desire" and mixed quartet "Eternal Friends", adding to the atmosphere of the performances.
					
					"Forward toward Stars" composed and represented by Pavel Ovsyannikov, head and chief conductor of the orchestra, made artistic representation of the spirit of Juche Korea which demonstrated its space science and technology, and general national power before the world through the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2.
					
					Through chorus and orchestral music "Our Leader Loved by the People" the performers sang high praises of the boundless trust in Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Among the audience were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, and officials concerned and art troupes of armed forces organs, creators and artistes in the field of literature and art, journalists and media persons and other people in Pyongyang. 
					
					Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK and his embassy members enjoyed the performance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Sariwon, October 19 (KCNA) -- A birthday spread sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un was handed on Saturday to woman centenarian Sin So Nyo who is residing in Pongui-ri, Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province.
					She was subject to all sorts of maltreatment and humiliation as a member of the stateless nation a century ago. It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated the country that she could lead a worthy life as a human being.
					
					She worked hard to implement the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of agriculture for years. She has sincerely helped farmers since she became a pensioner, prompted by the desire to contribute to the nation's food production.
					
					She is now leading an optimistic life, tending her family's plot. She had a balanced diet.
					
					She is telling her children to work harder for the sake of the grateful country, saying that she lives long free from worries thanks to the WPK's politics of giving priority to the working people and the most advantageous socialist system.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the New Socialist Party of Japan headed by Eiko Tomiyama, vice-president of its Central Executive Committee, arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: DPRK Friendship Delegation Returns from Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Friendship Delegation Returns from Russia
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK friendship delegation headed by So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, returned home on Friday after visiting Russia.

articles.title: DPRK Youth Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Youth Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK youth friendship delegation led by Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, came back home on Saturday after visiting China.

articles.title: Senior Party, State and Army Officials Visit New Flats for Educators
articles.content:
Senior Party, State and Army Officials Visit New Flats for Educators
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Senior party, state and army officials visited families of teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University who moved to new flats.
					Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, and officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Saturday visited the flats of Academician, Prof. and Dr.  Kim Sang Ok, director of a research institute who is winner of Kim Jong Il Prize, labor hero and people's scientist, Academician, Prof. and Dr.  Ri Chang Guk and Merited Scientist, Academician, Prof. and Dr. Ri Kwang Yong, both researchers, and other teachers and researchers.
					
					They went round the interior of their flats furnished with FHD LED TV sets sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un and quality household goods.
					
					They gave daily necessaries to them as souvenirs, sharing joy with them.
					
					Hearing their families give their impressions of their new flats, the officials talked about the deep loving care shown by Kim Jong Un who made so much effort to give them even one thing more so that even a trifling matter might not be missed after providing such wonderful flats to them.
					
					They told teachers and researchers of the university to train more talents who would shoulder upon themselves the future of the great Paektusan nation as required by the age of knowledge-based economy and the age of campaign of brains true to the party's idea of valuing them.

articles.title: Okryu Children's Hospital, Product of WPK's Deep Concern for Children
articles.content:
Okryu Children's Hospital, Product of WPK's Deep Concern for Children
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Okryu Children's Hospital has been built in the Munsu area on the bank of the Taedong River in Pyongyang. 
					The hospital, named by Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, is a modernly-equipped center for comprehensive medical service as well as for scientific research.
					
					The six-storied hospital stands opposite to the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital. Its surround is covered by green lawn and decorated with sculptures of different themes and fountains suited to children's sentiment.
					
					The interior of the hospital looks like a palace. All walls are drawn with more than 1 700 pictures from Korean children's films and collections of world's famous tales for children.
					
					On the ground floor, there are different kinds of medical treatment rooms and a flower shop.
					
					The hospital has indoor playgrounds and resting places, furnished with slide and other apparatuses and playthings. Soft benches of various colors are seen here and there.
					
					There are also classrooms with signboards reading "For Secondary Schoolers", "For Primary Schoolers" and "For Preschoolers".
					
					All treatment rooms, checkup rooms and sickrooms of the hospital are equipped with latest medical apparatuses.
					
					Medical service is given on a fractionized basis and all-out physical checkup is available for hospitalized children.
					
					In the hospital there is a helicopter landing field for patients from distance.
					
					The hospital is, indeed, a product of the loving care for the children shown by the Workers' Party of Korea that spares nothing for the children, regarding them as king of the country.

articles.title: Anniversary of Irrigation Designing Institute Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Irrigation Designing Institute Marked
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Irrigation Designing Institute marked the 60th anniversary of its founding.
					President Kim Il Sung founded the institute on October 20, Juche 42 (1953) and clearly indicated the orientation and ways to be followed by it.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il advanced the revolutionary policy on turning the country's irrigation system into the gravity-fed irrigation system and realigning the land as befitting the land of the socialist state. He wisely led the designers and officials of the institute to make a new innovation in the drive to give a face-lift to the appearance of the land.
					
					Over the past 60 years the institute has strengthened into the reliable irrigation designing base of the country with strong designing force and solid material and technological foundation and successfully carried out its revolutionary tasks.
					
					It designed the Kaechon-Lake Thaesong Waterway, the Paekma-Cholsan Waterway and the Miru Plain Waterway with gravity-fed form, guided the construction in a responsible manner and finished in a short span of time the designing for realigning hundreds of thousands of hectares of land in Kangwon, South Hwanghae and North Phyongan provinces.
					
					The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a congratulatory message to the designers and officials of the institute on the 60th anniversary of its founding.
					
					A meeting marking the anniversary took place on Saturday.
					
					Present there were Mun Kyong Dok, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, officials concerned and employees of the institute.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Some days ago U.S. Secretary of State Kerry blustered that the U.S. is ready for dialogue with the DPRK if the latter starts denuclearization first, and the former is ready to conclude a non-aggression treaty with the latter when its start of denuclearization becomes clear.
					Minju Joson Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					The army and people of the DPRK dismiss the U.S. stand on the issue of the relations between the DPRK and the U.S. as nothing but a cock-and-bull story told by the psychopaths.
					
					If the U.S. is truly willing to put an end to the history of mistrust and confrontation which has persisted on the Korean Peninsula, it should fully reexamine its hostile policy towards the DPRK and roll back it before urging Pyongyang to dismantle its nukes, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					Regretfully, the U.S. is unilaterally pressurizing the DPRK to dismantle its nukes, putting the hostile policy towards it on the shelf.
					
					This indicates that the U.S. is pursuing its sinister aim to stifle the DPRK rather than working for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					Even a mere child can easily understand that the DPRK cannot depend on a paper signed by the U.S. in order to protect the vital interests of the country.
					
					What the U.S. should do urgently is not to seduce the DPRK with its poor gimmick but to get confidence from the DPRK by lifting the unreasonable measures against it.
					
					This is the only way of mending the DPRK-U.S. ties.
					
					The U.S. should respect its dialogue partner and sincerely opt for finding a solution to the matter. This is the message of the army and people of the DPRK to the U.S.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Songun Leadership Feats of Kim Jong Il for All Ages
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Songun Leadership Feats of Kim Jong Il for All Ages
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il performed great feats by leading the revolution and construction to victory by dint of Songun for over half a century since he started his Songun revolutionary leadership, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an editorial.
					It goes on:
					
					It is the tasks of the army and the people of the DPRK and the requirements of the era to boundlessly glorify the immortal Songun leadership feats performed by Kim Jong Il and achieve a final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					In order to successfully fulfill the tasks before the army and people, all fields and units should thoroughly carry out his last instructions.
					
					Their determination to glorify his Songun leadership feats should be expressed not in making speeches or chanting slogans but in making efforts to thoroughly implement his last instructions given to relevant fields and units.
					
					The units associated with his leadership feats should become standard-bearers and models in the efforts for carrying out his behests.
					
					All the fields and units should thoroughly establish the revolutionary trait of devotedly implementing the party's policies and political tasks.
					
					Whoever has strong determination to thoroughly implement the party's policies can carry out any difficult task.
					
					Everybody is required to work hard to create everything in order to surpass the world's standard, not allowing any moment's stagnation and marking time.
					
					It is necessary to steadily intensify the work to bring Kim Jong Il's personality as a peerlessly great man and his immortal revolutionary feats home to the people so that not only the people of the present generation but the generations to come may glorify his feats forever.
					
					His Songun revolutionary idea and feats are shedding immensely bright rays as the eternal treasure of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Regime's Dangerous Nuclear War Moves against DPRK Assailed
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Regime's Dangerous Nuclear War Moves against DPRK Assailed
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. nuclear carrier George Washington which is called "floating military base" and "monster of war" is sailing in the East, South and West Seas of Korea at will. It is a clear evidence that the reckless moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK while posing a military threat to it have already gone beyond the limit. Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a commentary.
					We cannot but take a serious note of the fact that the entry of George Washington into the West Sea of Korea is aimed to prove effectiveness of the "tailored deterrence strategy", a reckless scenario for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, and supplement and complete it, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					The south Korean warmongers signed with the U.S. the document of "tailored deterrence strategy", crying out for "coping with nukes of the north", an act little short of formulating their aggressive attempt to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					The inter-Korean relations are being pushed into a deadlock again and tensions on the Korean Peninsula screwed up. Now is the time for the south Korean puppet ruling forces to act with reason, seriously reflecting on the grave consequences caused by their confrontational moves.
					
					George Washington, a synonym for a nuclear war, is watching for a chance to attack the DPRK while sailing in waters off Korea. The prevailing touch-and-go situation clearly proves before the international community who is senseless provoker and warmonger keen on escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula and bringing a dark cloud of a nuclear war to hang over there.
					
					It is nonsense and gangster-like sophism for the warmongers to clamor about someone's "abandonment of nukes", though they have gone frantic in their moves for igniting a nuclear war against the DPRK while introducing nuclear strike means into the Korean Peninsula one after another.

articles.title: All-People Anti-"government" Actions Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
All-People Anti-"government" Actions Declared in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- 21 solidarity organizations of south Korea including the People's Action for Setting Right the People's Pension and the Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference at the plaza of the Seoul City Office on Oct. 16 at which they declared all-people anti-"government" actions.
					A press release was read out at the conference.
					
					It denounced Park Geun Hye for reneging on many commitments made during her election campaign in which she advertised "principle" and "confidence" as a tenet of her policies.
					
					Most of her commitments were the  promises she made with the workers, youth, old men and  other people of society, it said, accusing the Park Geun Hye regime of revealing its true colors.
					
					It condemned the authorities for setting in motion the Intelligence Service and other conservative forces to mislead public opinion and enforce a rule under the pretext of security, far from apologizing and reflecting on their breaking of those promises.
					
					The on-going suppression of the pro-democracy trade unions in the wake of that of the Teachers Union proves that the Park regime is trampling down the basic right of labor, it charged.
					
					It declared that civic and public organizations would turn out in the all-people actions against the regime which has reneged on the commitments.
					
					An action program was made public at the press conference.

articles.title: IS Director's Anti-DPRK Outbursts under Fire
articles.content:
IS Director's Anti-DPRK Outbursts under Fire
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Nam Jae Jun, director of the puppet Intelligence Service (IS) of south Korea, addressing a recent plenary meeting of the Intelligence Committee of the "National Assembly", talked nonsense about "the north's test of long-range missile propeller and forward-deployment of new type multiple launch rocket system". He even hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, raising a hue and cry over "declaration of reunification by use of forces" and the like. 
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					What should not be overlooked is that these tricksters, who used to mislead the public opinion by distributing misinformation on the DPRK among media behind the scene in the past, are now making public appearances to take the lead in the anti-DPRK smear campaign and false propaganda. 
					
					It has long been the main job of the IS to block the improvement of the north-south relations and incite hostility towards fellow countrymen in the north. 
					
					The IS was shrunk up by the loud voices of the Koreans calling for reunification that shook the whole land of Korea in the wake of  the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. But, it is now working with blood-shot eyes to revive the "yusin" dictatorship and bring the north-south relations to a collapse, backed by the present chief executive. 
					
					Traitor Nam Jae Jun is a main player in the campaign. 
					
					Nam let loose a whole string of unspeakable invectives against the DPRK on the basis of hackneyed misinformation at the puppet National Assembly. Lurking behind his backbiting was a sinister intention to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK, chill the mounting desire of the south Korean people for achieving reunification through alliance with the north and escalate the north-south confrontation. 
					
					Nam, who served the "yusin" dictator from when he was young, brought to light his bad temperament. No matter how vociferously the tricksters may trumpet, no one will believe them. 
					
					It is ridiculous, indeed, for Nam to float sheer lies. Equally miserable is the plight of the puppet chief executive of south Korea counting on such guy in his dotage.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Pursuing Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Pursuing Confrontation with DPRK
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The hard-won atmosphere for improving the inter-Korean relations was vitiated and confrontation is escalating. This is entirely due to the south Korean authorities working hard to abuse the inter-Korean dialogue for escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The south Korean puppet regime is crying out for "adhering to the principle", creating impression that the DPRK is to blame for the bedeviled inter-Korean relations. But this is no more than a shameful artifice to deceive public at home and abroad.
					
					Its acts of straining the inter-Korean relations, trumpeting about "theory of principle," are a natural product of its vicious policy of confrontation against reunification.
					
					As soon as it took office, the puppet conservative group touted "confidence-building process" as its "policy toward the north", noisily advertising that it would do something for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					The group has worked overtly and covertly to turn the venues of dialogue and negotiations with the DPRK into theaters of confrontation after deeming it a "principle" of north-south relations to implement the ill-famed confrontation policy.
					
					The puppet authorities' moves for escalating confrontation are unpardonable acts of treachery as they are aimed at repeating the catastrophic events that happened in the north-south relations for the past five years in order to follow in the footsteps of the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					The past five years was a history of misfortune in which the cause of national reunification faced great difficulties and stern trials and not only south Korean people but all other Koreans were exposed to the threat of a war against the north.
					
					The present situation of the inter-Korean relations urgently requires all Koreans in the north, south and overseas to turn out in a nationwide struggle to frustrate the moves of the puppet conservative group to escalate the confrontation against reunification.
					
					The prospect of the inter-Korean relations and national reunification depends on how all the Koreans wage the struggle against those moves.
					
					The historic north-south declarations are the only just guidelines to be held fast to by all Koreans in the efforts to mend the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Authorities' Interference in Election Disclosed
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Authorities' Interference in Election Disclosed
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- It has been recently disclosed in south Korea that not only the Intelligence Service but the military authorities worked hard to build public opinion during the puppet presidential election, sparking off social uproar.
					According to a lawmaker from the opposition Democratic Party of south Korea on Oct. 15, agents of the Cyber Command of the puppet army built public opinion, posting on websites articles slandering candidates from opposition parties and supporting Park Geun Hye and the ruling party during the election campaign.
					
					It was reported that these agents were elite agents who received "citations" from the Defense Ministry for their "skilful" handling of military secrets and activities for psychological warfare. They committed such acts under the patronage of the puppet IS.
					
					In those days the Cyber Command received 4.5 billion won from the IS. The head of the command admitted that part of the funds for operations was from the IS's budget. 
					
					Such being a hard reality, the puppet minister of Defense insisted that the budget of the Cyber Command was not included in the IS's budget.
					
					When the fact was disclosed, he let loose sheer sophism that in case part of the budget comes from the IS, it is military spending and there are cooperative relations with the IS, not instructive relations.
					
					It was disclosed that the military authorities cooperated with the IS, even receiving money from it at a time when the whole of south Korea is turning into a theatre of candlelight actions and people are enraged by the IS's illegal interference in the election. This is giving further momentum to the protest actions of south Koreans against the present conservative ruling forces.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Marked in Switzerland
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Marked in Switzerland
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on October 9 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					The statement said:
					
					The WPK built a paradise for the people under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					So the Korean people call their party a mother party.
					
					The WPK, upholding the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, turned the country into a nuclear weapons state.
					
					It is demonstrating its dignity as a party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as it is led by supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is a great successor to the cause of Songun revolution.
					
					Kim Jong Un is further glorifying the revolutionary exploits of the great Generalissimos by thoroughly embodying Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					The WPK is waging dynamic struggle for improving the standard of people's living and achieving the national reunification under his leadership of Songun revolution.
					
					Juche Korea will surely emerge as a thriving socialist country.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Observed in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in DR Congo and Pakistan and an opening ceremony of Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Brazil between October 8 and 10 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					The deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of DR Congo who is chairman of DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association said that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung is a party representing the will and wishes of the working popular masses.
					
					He went on:
					
					The WPK has demonstrated its dignity as a mass party fully supported and trusted by the popular masses and an invincible revolutionary party and victoriously advanced the revolution and construction thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					The immortal exploits the President and Kim Jong Il performed in the cause of building the party of Juche will shine forever along with the bright future of the WPK.
					
					It is the fixed will and faith of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, to steadily develop it under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					The WPK headed by Kim Jong Un will always emerge victorious.
					
					The secretary general of the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies praised the WPK's glorious history for winning only victories under the leadership of the great men of the century.
					
					Speakers including the general secretary of the Sind State Committee of the Pakistan Awami National Party referred to the fact that the President and Kim Jong Il turned the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party and the DPRK into a thriving socialist power centered on the masses and Kim Jong Un is creditably carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					Messages of greeting to Kim Jong Un were adopted in the events held in DR Congo and Pakistan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Libya
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Libya
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in pamphlet by the Amal Awail Publishing House of Libya on October 9.
					The work made public by him on April 15, Juche 101 (2012) says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to demonstrate the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website an article titled "Hot wind of sports in DPRK" on October 9.
					The article said the hot wind of sports sweeps the DPRK, adding this would be unthinkable apart from supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					The article went on:
					
					It is Kim Jong Un's firm resolve and will to rank the DPRK among sports powers within a few years.
					
					Epoch-making measures for developing the sports were taken in succession such as the establishment of regular guidance system over sports and the consolidation of scientific system of training reserves amid his deep concern.
					
					He gave instructions concerning sporting skills, tactical system and training methods and indicated the orientation and ways for building a sports power including issues of developing the sports science, doing the work of selecting and training players in a far-sighted way, popularizing physical culture and sports and making sports part of daily life.
					
					He watched the training of players and their games several times though he was busy leading the overall state affairs.
					
					He also met winners in international games and highly appreciated them.
					
					And he watched games of working people and servicemen.
					
					He shows special concern over the work of providing wonderful stadium and sports facilities to sportspersons and other people.
					
					The sports enthusiasm mounting in the DPRK is resulting in wonderful successes in international games.
					
					The DPRK players have continuously proved successful this year.
					
					The country is vigorously advancing toward the sports power amid ever-growing zeal for sports.

articles.title: Figure of DR Congo Gives Impression of DPRK
articles.content:
Figure of DR Congo Gives Impression of DPRK
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Jean Mbongopassi, secretary general of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo, who took part in events for celebrating the 65th anniversary of the DPRK, gave his impressions of the country in a briefing session on return on October 9.
					He said that his visit to the DPRK was like a story of a believer meeting a god whom he ardently worshipped.
					
					He went on:
					
					I, experiencing the reality of the DPRK for the first time, have had feelings that I had been to a fairyland different from our world.
					
					Everyone in the DPRK regards supreme leader Kim Jong Un as father and ardently follows and reveres him.
					
					The leader makes continuous tour of field guidance for the happiness of the people and they devote themselves to him.
					
					The bonds of kinship between the leader and the people were fully demonstrated at a parade of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and Pyongyang mass demonstration for celebrating the 65th anniversary of the DPRK held at Kim Il Sung Square on September 9.
					
					All foreigners who attended the events were stunned to see the true picture of all the people rallied close around the leader in one mind.
					
					It showed that no one could match the might of the DPRK.
					
					When I visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, I paid homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who lie in state and realized the loyalty of the Korean people holding the preceding leaders with clear conscience and moral obligation.
					
					While visiting the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong I felt the revolutionary martyrs lead eternal lives even after their death.
					
					In the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum I became to know better about undying exploits the President performed by leading to victory the Korean war ignited by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					The DPRK is a paradise of the people in which tax system is abolished and free education and free medical care are enforced.
					
					The people are enjoying their independent and creative lives with the jobs provided by the country.
					
					The Koreans are leading the most dignified and proud lives in the world which is attributable to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the greatest men.
					
					The DPRK is growing stronger thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un and the politics of love for people pursued by him instills great strength and courage into all the Koreans.
					
					The reality of the DPRK shows that a country with small population and territory can become powerful if it is led by the great leader and nothing is out of reach if the entire people are united around the outstanding leader in one mind.

articles.title: Minju Joson urge a EE.UU. retirar la politica hostil a RPDC
articles.content:
Minju Joson urge a EE.UU. retirar la politica hostil a RPDC
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el secretario de Estado norteamericano, Kerry, anuncio al mundo que Estados Unidos tiene la voluntad de dialogar con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y firmar el tratado de la no agresion cuando ella inicie primero la desnuclearizacion. 
					Esta posicion de EE.UU. es considerada como delirio por el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC, senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este sabado y continua:
					
					Si EE.UU. tiene de veras la voluntad de poner el punto final a la historia de desconfianza y confrontacion que perdura en la Peninsula Coreana, debe revisar y retirar primero su politica hostil a la RPDC, antes de imponerle unilateralmente la renuncia nuclear. 
					
					Este hecho demuestra que EE.UU. no tiene interes en la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana, sino abriga solo el siniestro intento de aplastar a la RPDC. 
					
					No se puede confiar los maximos intereses del pais en un papel que fuera firmado por EE.UU. 
					
					La prioridad de EE.UU. no es seducir a la RPDC sino conseguir la confianza cancelando la sancion y otras medidas anticoreanas. 
					
					Esto es la unica via para mejorar las relaciones RPDC-EE.UU.
					
					Este imperio debe respetar a la contraparte de dialogo y tomar actitud sincera para resolver el problema.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras militares de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras militares de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portaaviones nuclear de Estados Unidos "George Washington", conocido como "base militar flotante" y "monstruo de guerra", navega a su antojo por los mares Este, Oeste y Sur de Corea.
					Esto demuestra que ya pasaron el limite las aventureras maniobras de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea, que intentan provocar la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC amenazandola militarmente.
					
					Asi subraya el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado este sabado y continua:
					
					Lo mas grave es que la presencia de esta nave en el Mar Oeste de Corea es para revisar la eficacia y completar y perfeccionar la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste", guion de ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					Los belicistas titeres surcoreanos y su amo norteamericano firmaron el susodicho documento, hablando del supuesto "enfrentamiento a las armas nucleares del Norte". De esta manera, los titeres surcoreanos expusieron oficialmente su intento de ataque preventivo nuclear de caracter agresivo contra la connacional RPDC.
					
					Ahora, las relaciones intercoreanas se encuentran otra vez en la crisis y se crea en la Peninsula Coreana un estado muy tirante. En estos momentos los gobernantes surcoreanos deben reflexionar seriamente sobre las consecuencias de sus alborotos conflictivos y actuar con prudencia.
					
					La situacion critica de hoy demuestra claramente ante  la sociedad internacional quien es el provocador de guerra nuclear y quien es maniaco de guerra.
					
					Es una ilogica y sofisteria gangsteril el que hablen de la "renuncia nuclear" de alguien recurriendo freneticamente a la provocacion de guerra contra la RPDC al introducir muchos medios de ataque nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica palabras provocativas anti-RPDC de Nam Jae Jun
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica palabras provocativas anti-RPDC de Nam Jae Jun
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- En la reciente sesion de comite de informaciones de la "Asamblea Nacional", Nam Jae Jun, presidente del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea, se atrevio a difamar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC soltando chismes inventados como el "ensayo de cuerpo propulsor de misil de largo alcance" y la "ubicacion avanzada de lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados de ultima moda" de alguien y exponiendo la "declaracion abierta sobre la unificacion con las fuerzas armadas".
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que los conspiradores, que antes divulgaban sigilosamente a traves de la prensa los datos falsos sobre la RPDC, toman abiertamente la delantera en propagar la demagogia.
					
					Condena asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual insertado hoy y prosigue:
					
					Historicamente, la tarea medular de SNI fue obstaculizar la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas e inculcar la hostilidad a sus connacionales.
					
					Los compinches de SNI, que antes se quedaban contraidos ante el clamor de connacionales por la reunificacion despues de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, se enfrascan en resucitar la dictadura de "Yusin" y romper las relaciones Norte-Sur bajo el amparo de la actual mandataria.
					
					Precisamente, Nam toma la delantera de esas locuras.
					
					El actual proceder de Nam parte de su malsano intento de manchar la imagen de la RPDC, eliminar el clima de reunificacion en alianza con el Norte que se aumenta entre los habitantes surcoreanos y exacerbar mas la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Pero nadie prestara oidos a tales boberias.
					
					Es miserable la situacion de la mandataria surcoreana que cuenta con los cadaveres vivos como Nam.
